question: 外務大臣
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>outside</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji>s <kanji>minister</kanji> (<ja>大臣</ja>) is someone who is tasked with dealing with things that are outside the country. This is the <vocabulary>minister of foreign affairs</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
